actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 108(f) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the tax exclusion for discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans made on or after January 1, 1986, by a State with no accredited professional law or medical schools. Waives the statute of limitations for tax claims.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 108(f) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans.
